AboutMe__description: I'm a front-end developer from Czech Republic since 2022. My goal is to create awesome & responsive websites. I accept new projects with happines, and I cannot wait to bring your dream website to life!
html__descritpion: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages.
css__descritpion: CSS is the language we use to style a Web page.
js__descritpion: JavaScript is a scripting language that allowes to create dynamic and interactive web content like applications and browsers.
react__descritpion: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application.
webNotFound__descritpion: It looks like this website was not uploaded or this project was deleted.
projectDescritpion__rlp: A simple web for minecraft project named Right Land Paradise.
projectDescritpion__rlpBot: A discord BOT for minecraft project named Right Land Paradise.
pricesBasic__features: • Responsive Design • Dynamic Content • And more!
footer__contacts: Hello! It's seems that you've reached the point where my contacts should be. If you want to order a website, please contact me via discord or email
